usage.headings: Manrope (Bold/Black) - Use for Page Titles, Card Headers
usage.body: Inter (Regular/Medium) - Use for general text, labels
usage.code: JetBrains Mono - Use for M3U Links, DNS IPs, MAC Addresses

buttons.style: Use 'default' variant for primary actions. Add 'shadow-lg shadow-violet-500/20' for glow effect on primary buttons.

cards.style: Border-1 border-border/50. In dark mode, use 'bg-card/50 backdrop-blur-sm' for glass effect.

inputs.style: h-10 bg-background border-input focus:ring-2 focus:ring-violet-500/20 focus:border-violet-500 transition-all

tables.style: Clean, minimal. Header text-muted-foreground uppercase text-xs tracking-wider. Row hover effect 'hover:bg-muted/50'.

dialogs.style: Backdrop blur-sm. Content bg-background border border-border shadow-2xl.

sidebar.style: Fixed left. Border-r border-border. bg-background/95 backdrop-blur supports-backdrop-filter:bg-background/60.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use 'backdrop-blur-md bg-background/80' for sticky headers and overlays.
visual_enhancers.gradients: Use subtle gradients for text highlights or button backgrounds. Avoid full-screen gradients.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use colored shadows for primary elements to create depth in dark mode.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'border-white/10' in dark mode for subtle definition.

login_background.usage: Right side of the login screen, full height, covered with a dark overlay.

user_portal_hero.usage: Hero section background for the User Portal.

dns_server_visual.usage: Visual header or card background for the DNS Management section.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add 'Manrope', 'Inter', and 'JetBrains Mono' via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS import.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the specified colors (Electric Violet, Cyber Blue) and fonts.
3. CREATE LAYOUTS: Build a 'DashboardLayout' (Sidebar + Header + Content) and a 'AuthLayout' (Split Screen).
4. IMPLEMENT PAGES: Start with Login, then Dashboard, then User Management.
5. APPLY STYLES: Use the defined component styles. Override default Shadcn styles where necessary to match the 'E1' aesthetic.
6. ADD MOTION: Use 'framer-motion' for page transitions and list entrance animations (staggered).
7. DATA-TESTID: Ensure every interactive element (buttons, inputs, links) has a 'data-testid' attribute.
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Never use AI assistant Emoji characters.
